title: Gold Peony
description: The New York witch is going to California, and nothing will ever be the same again. Reeling from their losses, Adam and Mina seek answers from their family, to protect their future and each other. Together, they must uncover the secrets of their parents' past, before time runs out for all of them. Now that the Xing children have returned to San Francisco, something wicked is sure to follow..
author: Ande Li
